data.title: Blue Bell Ice Cream Announces New Flavor for Summer 2024
data.meta_description: It's hot in South Louisiana and Texas, and there may be nothing better than a bowl of cold Blue Bell Ice Cream.
data.text:
It's hot in South Louisiana and Texas, and there may be nothing better than a bowl of cold Blue Bell Ice Cream.

If you love ice cream, and who doesn't when the heat is 105 degrees, you're going to love what Blue Bell is bringing to the stores starting today, Thursday, July 11, 2024.

The popular ice cream brand has announced that they are introducing us to their latest flavor and it is, "Cookies ‘n Cream Cheesecake Ice Cream."

Just the title of the latest flavor is enticing, but if you want more Blue Bell says this flavor, "Is a rich cheesecake ice cream blended with chocolate cookie crusted cheesecake pieces and chocolate crème-filled cookies."

So, if you're shopping today and looking for a way to cool off or if you need a new treat for the kids this summer, look for Cookies ‘n Cream Cheesecake Ice Cream because we will be too this afternoon.

We know that this will taste as delicious as it sounds.
